thread.title: Win one of five Carluccio's hamper
thread.title_full: Win one of five Carluccio's hamper - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Win one of five Carluccio's hamper
text: To celebrate our exclusive booklets, Carluccio's Summer Recipes , free inside the newspaper on Sunday July 11 & 12, we have teamed up with Carluccio to offer five lucky Telegraph readers a bespoke hamper, worth £200 each. A Carluccio’s hamper is a food lover’s paradise with beautifully packaged artisan products that taste as good as they look. Imported directly from Italy, they are all made using time-honored recipes, many handed down from generation to generation. Making perfect gifts for any occasion, from Weddings to Birthdays, Anniversaries and ‘Thank Yous’, the selection of hampers feature the best of Italian products - pesto, pasta, porcini, prosecco and preserves sit alongside olive oils, balsamic vinegars, biscuits and chocolates. You can even visit the Carluccio's online shop and create your own personalized gift box: select your favorite products and we’ll pack and deliver them in a red Carluccio’s box tied with a ribbon. To enter, simply fill in the form below. Follow @telegraph
